scheduledFacts.label: Sachin Tendulkar has scored most runs across all the world cup tournaments, ie 2,278.

image.altText: A picture of Sachin Tendulkar, not a duck

scheduledFacts.label: Ducks are curious and friendly creatures, they have been domesticated as pets and farm animals for more than 500 years.

image.altText: A picture of Sachin Tendulkar, not a duck

constantFacts.label: Mallard ducks live 5 to 10 years in the wild and 8+ years in captivity.

value.label: Dog eyes have a part called the tapetum lucidum, allowing night vision.

value.label: Human blood pressure goes down when petting a dog. And so does the dog’s.

value.label: Dogs are not colorblind. They also see blue and yellow.

quizQuestions.label: Which cricket team has won the most number of world cups?

value.label: The Australia national cricket team is the joint oldest team in Test cricket history, having played in the first ever Test match in 1877.

image.altText: Look at these dapper men.

quizQuestions.label: How many matches were played in the inaugural World Cup held in 1975?

value.label: The 1975 Cricket World Cup was the first edition of the Cricket World Cup, organised by the International Cricket Conference.

image.altText: Made this in 10 minutes.
